comment._content: Same buildings in the background of "Pilot Office" photo. www.flickr.com/photos/nlireland/6969068431/in/photostream/ No3 or No5 has got dredger buckets.

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/blackpoolbeach] Ah Pete, so is the Pilot Office just out of sight on the right of this one then??
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons

comment.author: 8214568@N08
comment._content:
Ths is most likely Spencer Dock on the north side of the river, with Workman, Clark & Co, Shipyard (the "Wee Yard"), in the background.
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/nlireland] Yes, the Pilot Office would be to the photographer's right!

comment.author: 14302637@N08
comment._content: The photographer could be on the same quay as the Pilot Office. Bottom-left of Beachcomber's map.

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: On "my" map, are those dots around the edge of the wharf the mooring bollards we see in the photo?
